DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study investigate performance contact lens maintenance system use silicone hydrogel contact lenses daily wear period 1 month .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Contact Lens Maintenance Systems Silicone Hydrogel Lenses
DOC.criteria: Is correctable least 20/40 distance visual acuity eye spherical contact lens . Is experienced soft contact lens wearer least 1 month . Has clinically significant anterior eye finding . Has active ocular disease . Requires concurrent ocular medication . Eye surgery injury within 12 week prior enrolment . Has systemic disease ocular abnormality might interfere contact lens wear Has preexisting ocular irritation would preclude contact lens fit . PMMA lens wear previous 6 month . EW CW previous 1 month . Hydrogen peroxide user Latex sensitivity
